column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Josh - Thank you very much for the 5-star review. We greatly appreciate it. And don't be so hard on yourself! (J/K). JINYA is a long play -- we plan to be a part of Houston's culinary landscape for years and years to come. We thank you for your kind words and your patronage
column2: and we look forward to your next visit.
